RASP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Raspadskaya, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mining of coking coal and anthracites. It holds various coal assets located in the Kemerovo region, Russia, including three underground mines, two open-pit operations, a coal preparation plant, and coal transportation and production facilities. The company's principal asset is the Raspadskaya Mine. It supplies its products to the smelters in Russia, as well as exports to Ukraine, Romania, Hungary, and Bulgaria. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Mezhdurechensk, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Raspadskaya is a subsidiary of EVRAZ plc.
